text:
Question 145) Coffee in Brazil consumption reached the highest level in history last year: Brazilians drank the equivalent of 331 billion cups.
look. Ed. 2158, 31 Mar. 2010.
Consider that the cup cited in the news is equivalent to approximately 120 ml of coffee. Suppose in 2010 Brazilians drink even more coffee, increasing consumption by 1 5 than it was consumed the previous year. According to this information, what is the most approximate forecast for coffee consumption in 2010?
A) 8 billion liters.
B) 16 billion liters.
C) 32 billion liters.
D) 40 billion liters.
E) 48 billion liters.
